markdownRemark.excerpt:
During the last 5 days the server hosting Jug Padova has been
erased+reconfigured due to an intrusion of some guys who wanted to play with Unreal Tournament…
markdownRemark.html:
During the last 5 days the server hosting Jug Padova has been erased+reconfigured due to an intrusion of some
guys who wanted to play with Unreal Tournament game.
Many thanks for your patience waiting the blog’s rebirth and
expecially to BennyHill, Carambar, ConTreX, Epilogue,
Haribo, PsychoRex, thyrex, Tomat0 and XpliCiT for making it
possible (and also necessary).

PS: Next time guys, please ask us for a disk
quota and some Mbs of network bandwidth… we’ll be glad of playing all
toghether without the need to nuke the server ;-)

frontmatter.title: Torpark...and u are free to go everywhere
